Package com.akkaserverless.javasdk.replicatedentity

Replicated Entity support.

Replicated Entities can be annotated with the @ReplicatedEntity annotation, and supply command handlers using the @CommandHandler annotation.

The data stored by a replicated entity can be stored in a subtype of ReplicatedData. These can be created using a ReplicatedDataFactory, which is a super-interface of both the ReplicatedEntityCreationContext, available for injection constructors, and of the CommandContext, available for injection in @CommandHandler annotated methods.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandContext
    Context for handling a command.
    ReplicatedCounter
    A counter that can be incremented and decremented.
    ReplicatedData
    Root interface for all data entries in Replicated Entities.
    ReplicatedDataFactory
    Factory for creating Replicated Data objects.
    ReplicatedEntityContext
    Root context for all Replicated Entity contexts.
    ReplicatedEntityCreationContext
    Context for Replicated Entity creation.
    ReplicatedEntityHandler
    Low level interface for handling Replicated Entity commands.
    ReplicatedEntityHandlerFactory
    Low level interface for handling commands for replicated entities.
    ReplicatedEntityOptions
    Root entity options for all Replicated Entities.
    ReplicatedMap<K,​V extends ReplicatedData>
    A Replicated Map that allows both the addition and removal of objects in a map.
    ReplicatedRegister<T>
    A Last-Write-Wins Register.
    ReplicatedSet<T>
    A Replicated Set that allows both the addition and removal of elements in a set.
    Vote
    A Vote replicated data type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReplicatedCounterMap<K>
    A Map of counters.
    ReplicatedRegisterMap<K,​V>
    A Map of registers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ReplicatedRegister.Clock
    A clock.
    WriteConsistency
    Write consistency setting for replication of state updates for Replicated Entities.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CommandHandler
    Marks a method as a command handler.
    ReplicatedEntity
    A replicated entity.
